text: "Just Dropped In (To See What Condition My Condition Was In)" is a 1967 song by Kenny Rogers featuring Kenny Rogers and The First Edition. It went to number 5 in the United States. It was taken from their album The First Edition. == References == Category:1967 songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs Category:Supergrass songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Tom Jones (singer) songs Category:Reef (band) songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Just Dropped In (To See What Condition My Condition Was In)
